overview: Secondary school students, Amir and Mastura, vow to get married to each other after their university years. However, things are not as easy as they envisaged. Their relationship faces a string of problems when Mastura doesn't turn up for her SPM examination and her parents plan to get her engaged to her rich schoolmate, Fandi.
tagline: Filem Komedi Untuk Remaja ... Yang Ingin Nak Kawin Lari ...!!!
title: Gila-Gila Pengantin Remaja
